title: UK Space Agency: Education and Outreach Officer - HEO

content.text: The UK Space Agency (UKSA) is an executive agency of the Department for Business, Energy & Industrial Strategy (BEIS) and provides technical advice on the government’s space strategy, supporting the UK space sector to deliver the government’s vision.
This is an opportunity to join the UK Space Agency as an Education and Outreach Officer. You'll be helping to deliver education and engagement initiatives that are integral to the success of agency.
More information about the Agency is available here.

To ensure successful delivery of a range of exciting, ambitious and inspirational education and engagement initiatives that are integral to the success of UK Space Agency programmes as set out in the Agency’s Education, Skills and Outreach Strategy. Deliver outcomes of the Education, Skills and Outreach Strategy by:
For more information, view the job advert here or contact the vacancy manager, Peter Trussell: Peter.Trussell@ukspaceagency.gov.uk.
